content: the stitches on each side of the square round 14 repeat round 11 by adding 1 more set of the stitches on each side of the square continue the pattern to be as big as you want by repeating rounds 12 through 14 by adding 1 more set of the stitches on each side of the square finish your creation with the last third repeated round like round 14 and add a border if you wish of your choice the written pattern is available on ravelry you can use the pattern to create any item you want and sell your finished item if you wish but you have no right to claim that this pattern is created by you neither to sell the pattern nor to share the file of the written pattern free when sharing your creation on a social media facebook instagram etc please add the link to the pattern on ravelry or use #pixietalespattern and @bebablanket thank you the pattern is created by bebablanket april 2019 https //beba-blanket weebly com/ ♡ https //linktr ee/bebablanket ♡ 3
